TopicTitle: celestial body discovery before exploration mod

Articles.Content:
I thought I saw thread other day for a plugin which hides all the bodies in game except the mun and kerbin. It then make you spend science and funds to randomly discover bodies to explore.

But the thread sank into obscurity before I could get home and find it again.

Anyone know what I'm talking about, or do I need to talk to my dr. about lowering the meds again...
That's the one. Thank you so much!
